topic.title: EMS Physical Assessment Section - conformance rules

lines.i: A collection of qualitative assessments of the patient's physical condition and other facts

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.20"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10337)/@code="29545-1" Physical findings Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10336)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Physical Assessment Section" (CONF:10339)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10975)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Physical Assessment Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.78)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10977)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Pregnancy (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.79)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10979)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Last Oral Intake (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.80)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10981)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Age (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.81)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10983)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Thrombolytic Contraindications (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.82)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10985)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Barriers To Patient Care (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.83)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10337)/@code="29545-1" Physical findings Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10336)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Physical Assessment Section" (CONF:10339)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10975)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Physical Assessment Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.78)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10977)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Pregnancy (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.79)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10979)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Last Oral Intake (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.80)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10981)
